titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 296) affirming the United States record on the Armenian Genocide.
Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 296) affirming the United States record on the Armenian Genocide.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-263, by Mr. McGovern.
Rule provides for consideration of H. Res. 296 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 50.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 655.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 189 (Roll no. 587).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 191 (Roll no. 588).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 296 (affirming the United States record on the Armenian Genocide).
